rationale: The segment contains 'less likely', which modifies 'see stories', not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: 'The more people see of this type of pro-raw-milk content in their social media feeds, algorithms will keep giving them more of it [pro-raw-milk content], and then they are less likely to see stories about people harmed by raw milk,' Gall Myrick said.
